item.title: Best WordPress Themes & HTML Templates for Domain Parking
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
What is Domain Parking? Domain parking is the act of leveraging advertisements on a web domain in order to generate revenue while that domain is dormant. By parking a domain, you make money based on how many users land on your site and click the advertisements. Another notable use case of a parked domain is […]

The post Best WordPress Themes & HTML Templates for Domain Parking appeared first on Branditechture.
item.content:encoded:
What is Domain Parking?

Domain parking is the act of leveraging advertisements on a web domain in order to generate revenue while that domain is dormant. By parking a domain, you make money based on how many users land on your site and click the advertisements. Another notable use case of a parked domain is to notify visitors that the domain is intended for sale or lease. Have you ever visited a website and you get a notice saying “This Domain is for Sale”?. Yeah, that’s domain parking in action. If youâ€™re looking for the best WordPress theme or HTML template for domain parking, youâ€™ve come to the right place. Read on for a list of my personalized recommendation below.

What is a WordPress Theme?

Short Answer: A WordPress theme is a ready-made design template for a WordPress-based website. A WordPress theme is responsible for the overall appearance of the entire WordPress-based website, including visual elements such as fonts, sizes, and colours.

An HTML template serves the same purpose as a WordPress theme, only that you’d have to make any modifications to the (HTML) template using a code editor (e.g Visual Studio Code).

Why you should use an HTML Template for a Domain Parking Page instead of WordPress.

  1. HTML Templates are lightweight
  2. HTML Templates load very fast since no server-side preprocessing is required
  3. You would not need to buy a hosting plan just to park web domains you can simply plug your domain into a Github Pages repo using the custom domain feature.
  4. Installing WordPress for the sole purpose of parking a domain is a waste of web hosting resources.

Why you may need to use a WordPress Theme for a Domain Parking Page instead of an HTML Template.

  1. You don’t know how to code in HTML
  2. You don’t know how to code working contact forms.
  3. Â You are more comfortable with using page builders like Elementor.

Best WordPress Themes for Domain Parking

Choosing the best WordPress theme or HTML Template is not an easy task: there are thousands of both free and premium domain parking WordPress themes and HTML templates to choose from, each with its own unique set of features and benefits. As a web designer, Iâ€™ve spent the past 10 years trying out several premium domain parking themes and HTML templates from Themeforest, WP Astra, WooThemes, Themeisle, Elegant Themes, and StudioPress, and I have been able to narrow down the top-performing domain parking WordPress themes and HTML Templates to a select few.

The 8 golden criteria for ranking the best domain parking WordPress themes and HTML Templates are;

  1. Design: The template or theme’s design must be visually optimized around the concept of domain parking.
  2. Speed & Performance: The template or theme must not be a resource hog and must load fully within 2 seconds.
  3. No feature bloat: Contains only the needed features (i.e domain parking.)
  4. Responsiveness: It must be adaptable to multiple screen sizes and resolutions.
  5. Personal Experience: My Overall Personal Experience with the Theme

So, based on the criteria above, here are the 4 best WordPress Themes and HTML templates for domain parking;

1. Domsell – Domain For Sale Template

Type: HTML Template

Domsell Domain Parking Template

Domsell â€“ is a responsive, Domain For Sale template. This minimal HTML template ships with a FOMO countdown timer, mail form and beautiful effects.Â 

This is my best domain parking template due to its appealing looks, and countdown functionality. But unfortunately, the developers, ArtSoundGroup, no longer provide support for this wonderful template. That being said, only go for this template if you are fairly good with HTML, CSS and JS.

Important Features of Domsell HTML Template

  • 18 HTML Pages
  • 16 Color Styles
  • Amazing CSS3 Effects/Animations
  • Responsive in Any Device
  • Fast and Lightweight
  • Countdown functionality for FOMO Marketing
  • Very Clean Design
  • Google Recaptcha
  • Well Commented Code
  • Detailed Documentation

ðŸ’µ Price: $12 USD

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/domsell/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY DOMSELL DOMAIN PARKING HTML TEMPLATE[/su_button]

3 Best WordPress Themes Strictly Made for NFT Marketplace Websites

2. DOMINA – Domain Sale And Auction Landing Page

Type: HTML Template

Domina Domain Parking HTML Template

DOMINA â€“ Domain Sale And Auction Landing Page is a template for creating a simple domain sale and auction landing page. The template is built with HTML5 and CSS3 and the newest version of the Twitter Bootstrap framework. DOMINA comes in five different template versions, allowing you to pick the best one for your auction or domain sale website.

DOMINA is available in six different colour schemes and six different typographic styles. A working contact form, a working local, and a subscription to MailChimp are all included. It’s built with a clean look and feel, and it’s responsive for all devices.

Important Features of Durel HTML Template

  • 5+ Landing Page Layouts
  • RTL Version Included
  • Dark & Light Mode Version
  • Responsive in Any Device
  • Fast and Lightweight
  • Smooth Transition Effects
  • Sass Included
  • Integrated with FontAwesome & Flaticon
  • Well Commented Code
  • Detailed Documentation

ðŸ’µ Price: $13USD

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/domina/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY DOMINA DOMAIN PARKING HTML TEMPLATE[/su_button]

3. Domania – Responsive Domain Template

Type: HTML Template

Domania HTML Domain Parking Theme

Domania is a new modern HTML template that allows you to sell your parked domain names with ease. Itâ€™s a one-page domain parking HTML template. This is specially created for individuals and companies who offer parked web domains for sale.

You can choose from at least, 5 homepage variations. It also comes with a ready-made contact form for prospects to get in touch with you right on the website.

Important Features of Domania – Responsive Domain Parking Template:Â 

  • 5+ Demo Variations
  • Working Contact Form
  • Responsive in Any Device
  • Fast, Lightweight & Powerful
  • Bootstrap (v4.x)
  • Sass Included
  • Well Commented Code

ðŸ’µ Price: $17 USD

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/domania/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY DOMANIA DOMAIN PARKING HTML TEMPLATE[/su_button]

4. Sala – Startup & SaaS WordPress Theme

Type: WordPress Theme

Sala Landing Page WordPress Theme

This is the only WordPress theme that is on our list of best domain parking themes and templates.

Sala is a unique top-notch technology & creative IT WordPress theme that can also be used as a parked domain landing page. With this theme, anyone can build landing pages for parked domains without having to deal with HTML and CSS codes.

You can easily customize your site by adding text and images through the popular Elementor drag-and-drop page builder. As mentioned previously, there’s absolutely no code required!

Important Features of Sala Startup & SaaS WordPress Theme

  • Full Light/Dark Mode: Toggle between Dark/Light Mode for a great viewing experience, especially in low-light environments. Turn on Dark Mode to give your eyes a break.
  • 16+ Predefined different homepage layouts: Sala comes with 16+ awesome homepage layouts. All homepage layouts are included in the demo content file.
  • Elementor Drop & Drag Page Builder: Fast, intuitive, and smart page builders will make your customization fast and easy.
  • One-click import: Many gorgeous landing page designs are available for you to adjust in just a clickâ€™s distance.
  • Advanced typography options: Choose any of the Google web fonts libraries through the powerful theme options panel! Now you can set a unique style for your brand!
  • Free Lifetime Updates & Support: Once you buy our theme. You will get free lifetime updates. Our awesome support team will handle any support questions to make sure you can finish customizing your website.
  • Detailed documentation online: Extensive documentation guides on how to set up and customize Factory will make your customizations super easy and fast!

ðŸ’µ Price: $59 USD

Supported Page Builder: Elementor

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/sala/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY SALA WORDPRESS THEME[/su_button]

The post Best WordPress Themes & HTML Templates for Domain Parking appeared first on Branditechture.

item.title: 3 Best WordPress Themes Strictly Made for NFT Marketplace Websites
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
Choosing the best WordPress theme is not an easy task: there are thousands of both free and premium NFT WordPress themes to choose from, each with its own unique set of features and benefits. As a web designer, Iâ€™ve spent the past 3 years trying out several premium NFT marketplace themes from Themeforest, WP Astra, […]

The post 3 Best WordPress Themes Strictly Made for NFT Marketplace Websites appeared first on Branditechture.
item.content:encoded:
Choosing the best WordPress theme is not an easy task: there are thousands of both free and premium NFT WordPress themes to choose from, each with its own unique set of features and benefits. As a web designer, Iâ€™ve spent the past 3 years trying out several premium NFT marketplace themes from Themeforest, WP Astra, WooThemes, Themeisle, Elegant Themes, and StudioPress, and I have been able to narrow down the top-performing NFT Marketplace WordPress themes to a select few.

I have done the research for you so you don’t have to spend hours doing the same thing. I will be updating this page as my experience changes while using the WordPress themes listed below.

What is a WordPress Theme?

Short Answer: A WordPress theme is a ready-made design template for a WordPress-based website. A WordPress theme is responsible for the overall appearance of the entire WordPress-based website, including visual elements such as fonts, sizes, and colours.

If youâ€™re looking for the best WordPress theme for an NFT Marketplace, youâ€™ve come to the right place. Read on for a list of my personalized recommendation below.

Ranking Criteria

The 8 golden criteria for ranking the 3 best NFT Marketplace WordPress themes are;

  1. Design: The theme’s design must be visually optimized around the concept of NFT Marketplace.
  2. Speed & Performance: The theme must not be a resource hog.
  3. No feature bloat: Contains only the needed features (i.e NFT Marketplace.)
  4. Responsiveness: It must be adaptable to multiple screen sizes and resolutions.
  5. Page Builder Compatibility: There should be in-built support for either Elementor, WP Bakery, or Gutenberg.
  6. Priority Support from Theme Developer: The theme developer must give priority and be attentive to all support requests.
  7. Ratings on Themeforest: Themeforest Ratings and Tone of Comments must be positive.
  8. Personal Experience: My Overall Personal Experience with the Theme

So, based on the criteria above, here are the 3 best WordPress Themes for NFT Marketplace;

1. Enefti

Enerfti NFT WP Theme

Enefti is the first truly functional WordPress NFT Theme with Metamask login.

Do you want to build an NFT Marketplace like Foundation or Opensea? This WordPress NFT theme is my top choice based on personal experience. With the Enefti NFT Marketplace theme, you can kickstart your own NFT marketplace in no time.

The good thing about this NFT marketplace WordPress theme is that the developers give 6 months of priority support for free after you purchase it. So if you run into any issue, all you need to do is raise a ticket, and they’d attend to you promptly. You can optionallyÂ extend this support to 12 months at an additional fee of $17.63 USD.

This is my best NFT theme so far because it has the most complete set of features required to build a true NFT marketplace.Â 

Unique Features of Enefti NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme:

  1. Metamask Login:Â You can log in directly to your Metamask wallet to purchase NFT items.
  2. ETH Prices: Prices of NFT listings can be viewed in either your local currency or ETH (Ethereum).
  3. NFT Collections: Archive page that lists NFT Collections by a particular owner.
  4. Single NFT Page:Â This is similar to the single product pages on e-commerce websites, where you have full product descriptions, and reviews.
  5. NFT Shortcodes:Â This allows you to display any NFT item anywhere on your site. Even inside blog posts.
  6. NFT Creator addon: You can create (or mint) NFTs using this add-on.Â Â 

Other Features of Enefti NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme:

  1. List/Grid View Toggle:Â You can display NFT category archives in lists or in grids.
  2. One-click Demo Import: This NFT marketplace WordPress theme lets you import pre-built demo content that can help you get started and launch your NFT marketplace superfast.
  3. Ajax Live Search:Â This displays products search results or suggestions in real-time as you search.
  4. Pop-up Login and Social Auth: Users can easily register/log in via a popup modal. There is also an option to log in/register using social accounts like your Facebook and Twitter profiles.

Price: $59 USD

Supported Page Builder: WPBakery

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/enefti/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY ENEFTI NFT THEME[/su_button]

2. Netstorm – NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme

Netstorm NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme

Netstorm is a WordPress theme designed specifically for NFTs and NFT assets stores, crypto art marketplaces, and digital asset bidding websites. It’s well-designed, with modern features and coded using the latest web3 technology. This theme does not require any coding knowledge. This NFT Marketplace theme fully supports Elementor Page Builder. So if you are a die-hard Elementor user, this is surely the best option for you.

The developer, Theme_land, gives 6 months of priority support for free after you purchase it. So if you run into any issue, all you need to do is raise a ticket, and they’d attend to you promptly. You can, however, extend your 6-month free support to 12 months by paying an additional $10.13 USD.

Unique Features of Netstorm NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme:

  1. 25+ Elementor Custom NFT Widgets
  2. Ultra Modern NFT Marketplace Design
  3. Live NFT Auctions and Explore Filter

Other Features of Netstorm NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme:

  1. Child Theme Ready: a child theme comes pre-bundled for advanced users to customize the theme.
  2. One-click Demo Import: This NFT marketplace WordPress theme lets you import pre-built demo content that can help you get started and launch your NFT marketplace superfast.

Price: $39 USD

Supported Page Builders: Elementor

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/netstorm/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY NETSTORM NFT THEME[/su_button]

3. Toka NFT & Crypto WordPress Theme

Toka Crypto and NFT Marketplace WordPress Theme

TokaÂ is a modern crypto WordPress theme specially created for NFT, ICO, cryptocurrency, Web3, DApp, token, crypto trading, blockchain technology, and financial technology websites. It’s stylish, fully responsive, and easy to customize.

The developer, Duck-Themes, gives up to 6 months of priority support for free after you purchase it but you can extend this support to 12 months at an additional fee of $17 USD.

Unique Features of Toka NFT & Crypto WordPress Theme:

  1. ETH Prices: Prices of NFT listings can be viewed in either your local currency or ETH (Ethereum).
  2. NFT Collections: Archive page that lists NFT Collections by a particular owner.
  3. Single NFT Page:Â This is similar to the single product pages on e-commerce websites, where you have full product descriptions, and reviews.

Other Features of Toka NFT & Crypto WordPress Theme:

  1. Multiple Homepage Layouts: You can select from one of many exclusively designed homepage layouts depending on your use case.
  2. Elementor Support: This NFT Marketplace theme is compatible with Elementor, the world’s most popular page builder for WordPress.
  3. Child Theme Ready:Â Child theme comes pre-bundled for advanced users to customize the theme.
  4. One-click Demo Import: Import pre-built demo content and launch your NFT marketplace superfast.
  5. Multiple Homepage Layouts: Exclusively designed

Price: $59 USD

Supported Page Builders: Elementor Page Builder

[su_button url=”https://branditechture.agency/recommends/toka-nft-theme/” target=”blank” style=”noise” background=”#FF8C00″ size=”6″ wide=”yes” center=”yes” radius=”5″]TRY TOKA NFT THEME[/su_button]

 

The post 3 Best WordPress Themes Strictly Made for NFT Marketplace Websites appeared first on Branditechture.
